3: This Inver-Device... Tifa took it off herself.
It was broadcasting connection requests for Mind Beacons before it was taken off, so it's been like this the whole time.
But, what could possibly make a Construct take off their Inver-Device in a place full of the virus?
Commandant, I have a bad feeling about this.
Wait, there's a situation ahead.
Urgh...
Two Constructs... Corrupted...
According to the scans, these two Constructs were members of the Suzaku squad!
Connecting—
Hey there, congratulations.
I think you owe us an explanation. Weren't you trying to take down the 'Iron Maiden'?
Little Tifa is right by our side here, dear.
What?
I never said a thing about her being around that signal.
So you said all that to misdirect us?
Ex-act-ly.
We had to secure our little treat, you know? You all have yourselves to blame—we wouldn't have had to play this little trick if you weren't so efficient on your mission.
Impeding the mission like this, how are you going to explain to President Hassen?
Compared to the competition within Kurono, that's nothing. You know full well, don't you, Lee?
Alright, you can all continue dawdling around. We're digging in.
Wait! Are you really tryin—Hey!
Disconnected—
If her squad could've handled it on their own, there wouldn't be so many squads sent on this mission.
Those rabid hyenas...
Lee...
Let's start by investigating these two Corrupted Constructs. We'll catch up with them later.
Agreed.
